info.line-one: Don´t worry, it happens to the best of us! Fortunately, we´re here to help.
info.line-two: If you are a teacher or parent with a Mathletics account, we can send the details of your username and password to the email address you have registered with us (this will have been registered when your account was created). Enter your registered email address in the panel on the right …
info.line-three: For security and privacy reasons, unfortunately we are currently unable to send login details to students. If you are a student and have forgotten your username and/or password, please speak to your teacher or parent.
info.line-four: If you are a parent or teacher and have been unable to retrieve your details, or do not have an email address linked to your Mathletics account, contact our friendly team who will be very pleased to help you.
